title: Rust daemon and client path
description: Implement connect-or-spawn client behavior and resident daemon in Rust with protocol parity and index update handling.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Starting Rust daemon/client path to mirror Python behavior: socket reuse, spawn-on-missing, stale socket recovery, and index.list IPC.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust daemon/client path: protocol models, cache helpers, socket paths, daemon server, list command using daemon index.list with TASKULUS_NO_DAEMON fallback. Ran make check-rust (fmt/clippy/test).

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Completed Rust daemon/client path to match Python behavior (spawn, reuse, stale socket recovery, index.list). Tests: make check-rust.

custom.beads_acceptance_criteria: Rust CLI behavior matches Python for startup, reuse, and daemon RPC responses.
